articles.author: Jarrett Renshaw and Vladimir Soldatkin
articles.title: ‘Two paths’: Biden and Putin call yields threats, diplomacy - Sydney Morning Herald
articles.description: The Russian President told his American counterpart that a breakdown in ties “would be a mistake that our descendants would see as a huge error”.
articles.content: It would be a colossal mistake that would entail grave consequences, Ushakov said. He added that Putin told Biden that Russia would act as the US would if offensive weapons were deployed near America… [+2662 chars]
